import React,{createContext,useReducer} from 'react'

const storeitem = {
    shopingcart: [
        {id: 1,text: 'Aloha Shirt', amount: 500,image: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'},
        {id: 2,text: 'Baseball shirt', amount: 800,image: 'https://docksbeers.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/merch-TSHIRT-W-2.jpg'},
        {id: 3,text: 'Camp shirt', amount: 3000,image: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcQKoWFJVggWOjd5wKlf3EZjmVLtorigBTLTf6zzETk0HoFUoevv&usqp=CAU'},
        {id: 4,text: 'Orange Shirt', amount: 2000,image: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcRzt6ITaJpJSrMGLi29qd_A91Tr9VKTw3FSd_D94MFgqaxkA9E-&usqp=CAU'},
        {id: 5,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},

        {id: 7,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},

        {id: 9,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},
        {id: 10,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},

        {id: 12,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},

        {id: 15,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},
        {id: 16,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},
        {id: 17,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},
        {id: 18,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},

        {id: 20,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},
        {id: 21,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},

        {id: 24,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},
        {id: 25,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},
        {id: 26,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},
        {id: 27,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},
        {id: 28,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},
        {id: 29,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},
        {id: 30,text: 'Pink Shirt', amount: 200,image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1574180566232-aaad1b5b8450?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&w=1000&q=80'},
    ]
}

export const GlobalContext = createContext(storeitem)

export const GlobalProvider = ({children}) =>{
    const [state,dispatch] = useReducer(null,storeitem)
    
    return (
        <GlobalContext.Provider value={{shopingcart: state.shopingcart}}>{children}</GlobalContext.Provider> 
    )
}
